paper_title.ja: ポストモダンにおける社会理論
バウマンとパーソンズ
医療化のポリティクスーー「責任」と「主体化」をめぐってーー
医療社会学からみた人間と家族
パーソンズにおける「世俗化」の問題

paper_title.en: Medicine and "Modernity"(<Special Issue 2>Modern and Post-modern in Medicine)

description.ja: Medicine is said to have been in a state of great transition these days. In what sense and to what degree is this statement valid? Referring the concept of "modern medicine" and the debates concerning "modernity-postmodernity", this paper try to explicate the present state of medicine.
description.en: Medicine is said to have been in a state of great transition these days. In what sense and to what degree is this statement valid? Referring the concept of "modern medicine" and the debates concerning "modernity-postmodernity", this paper try to explicate the present state of medicine.
